upgrades.name: Reviewing Your Notes
upgrades.desc: Remembering what you've been taught doesn't happen by magic.

upgrades.name: Exploring New Ideas
upgrades.desc: Now that you're free to explore magic on your own without your master breathing down your neck, there's a few things you wanted to try...

upgrades.name: Studious Trance
upgrades.desc: Sometimes you lose track of hours in your magical studies, but the knowledge is a worthy reward.

upgrades.name: Mind Palace
upgrades.desc: A place for every piece of knowledge and every piece of knowledge has a place.

upgrades.name: Arcane Comprehension
upgrades.desc: Remembering things you've learned CAN happen by magic if you try hard enough.

upgrades.name: Runic Recollection
upgrades.desc: Your notes are inscribed with runes that improve your ability to remember the contents of each page.

upgrades.name: Studious Sleep
upgrades.desc: Days and weeks pass by as you study the minutiae of magic, but you no longer care: the magic is the most important thing.

upgrades.name: Memento Memory
upgrades.desc: One day you will learn everything there is to know, and at that point all there's left to do is remember.

upgrades.name: Crafting: Arms of Iron
upgrades.desc: Learn the basics of working with iron and other basic materials.
upgrades.extdesc: Unlocks basic materials and items for crafting.
upgrades.flavor: Normally you are supposed to get rusty, but it seems you already are.

upgrades.name: Crafting: Arms of Quicksteel
upgrades.desc: Learn how to handle advanced materials in your crafting endeavors.
upgrades.flavor: So named for how easy it is to work with, not for its aerodynamic qualities.

upgrades.name: Crafting: Masterwork arms
upgrades.desc: Learn how to craft advanced items.
upgrades.flavor: What the hell is a ricasso.

upgrades.name: Crafting: Arms of Adamant
upgrades.desc: Learn how to handle adamant and other magical materials.
upgrades.flavor: Most smiths would have trouble getting their forge to the temperature of dragonbreath. You, however, have a solution.

upgrades.name: Crafting: Transcendent arms
upgrades.desc: Learn how to craft things that go beyond masterwork.
upgrades.flavor: The elusive swordchucks you have heard about, sadly remain out of reach.
